entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question / Suggestion: Allow managed exports (UnmanagedCallersOnly) in non AOT scenarios. #90126
  • Socket UDP test failures due to endpoint mismatches #90125
    8.0.0
  • Json outerloop test failure "Reflection-based serialization has been disabled" #90121
  • Structs cannot be annotated as `RequiresUnreferencedCode` #90115
  • Custom Marshaller analyzers don't warn that bidirectional marshallers require a non-caller allocated buffer method, but ComInterfaceGenerator requires it #90112
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor, or console template with AOT/relinking fails with: `mono_wasm_load_runtime () failed Error: unreachable` #90111
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow UseWindowsService and UseSystemd to indicate whether they've activated #90105
    9.0.0
  • Performance Regression with .NET 8 Preview 6 #90101
    8.0.0
  • Installing newer Microsoft.AspNetCore.App without same Microsoft.NETCore.App breaks FX resolution #90096
  • [mono] Investigate enabling `CanEmitObjectArrayDelegate` to respect `DynamicCodeSupport` feature switch in `System.Linq.Expressions` library #90092
    Future
  • When calculating xxhash, net7.0 is slower than net6.0 #90090
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.TransactionManagerTest.DefaultTimeout_MaxTimeout_Set_Get #90085
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite #90084
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/VectorConvert_ro_Target_64Bit/VectorConvert_ro_Target_64Bit.cmd #90083
    8.0.0
  • Improve debugging of HttpRequestOptions #90082
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting #89283
    8.0.0
  • Build failure in CoreCLR legs in SuperPMI #90124
  • Cookies loaded from a file are not sent via HttpClientHandler #90031
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] 28 Regressions from DateTime and BLK<SIMD> changes #85336
  • Using 7.0.x packages for net6.0 #81971
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33127: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #88674
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24897: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #87501
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24936: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #87500
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-29331: .NET Denial of Service vulnerability #87498
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-32032: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #87496
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-28260: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #84637
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-21808: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #82112
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-21538 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #80449
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-41064 | .NET Information Disclosure Vulnerability #78042
  • Linear collection marshallers will generate calls to GetUnmanagedValuesDestination for 'out' variables during cleanup in ManagedToUnmanaged #89885
    8.0.0
  • Why is Numerics missing most of the geometries? #83083
  • Environment.SetEnvironmentVariables() creates REG_SZ instead of REG_EXPAND_SZ #89695
  • Consider adding option in csproj for software and fixed point number types #87793
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String Case Conversion #80245
  • BitConverter.GetBytes is incompatible with INumber<T> #80268
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression in IndexOfAny #77906
  • Unable to find dotnet runtime when DOTNET_ROOT is set on Mariner #82843
  • F5 (Run with Debugging) for Blazor and .NET MAUI and mobile SDKs #90045
  • Regressions in ICU globalization microbenchmarks #77730
    8.0.0
  • Libraries work to support Cloud Native effort for .NET 8 #78518
    8.0.0
  • Compatibility issue with ProcessStartInfo with UseShellExecute=False and WindowStyle=Hidden #89910
    8.0.0
  • [debugger] Test failure - DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestUncaughtWithReload #73957
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests` timing out on CI/linux #81170
    8.0.0
  • RandomAccess.FlushToDisk #86836
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM interactive debug session doesn't work with default project settings #56022
    8.0.0
  • CodeGen infrastructure work planned for .NET 8 #79018
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Make AggregationManager public #89727
    Future
  • NativeAOT size conscious authoring observations #83902
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.CallFunctionOnTests.InvalidPropertyGetters` timed out on rolling builds #79100
    8.0.0
  • Building iOS projects with AOT & LLVM enabled consumes all CPU cores and makes system unusable #89356
  • SIMD problems when mixing llvm and non-llvm code #73454
    8.0.0
  • .NET should no longer preemptively check for paths being too long #17328
    Future
  • ManualResetEventSlim.Set() should throw ObjectDisposedException #89692
  • Locking on `Console.Error` #90027
  • Provide an API for configuring `JsonSerializerOptions` instances for reflection-based serialization. #89934
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add async parse overload for `JsonNode` #88248
    Future
  • Fix how `System.Linq.Expressions.dll` is supported on iOS-like platforms #87924
    8.0.0
  • Implementation of a static virtual method in a derived type is not found when there is a re-abstraction of the same method higher in inheritance hierarchy #80350
    8.0.0
  • [Android] Error compiling in release mode #90030

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `emitDispEmbBroadcastCount` to display the embedded broadcasted element count. #90123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Replace `SetErrorMode` with `SetThreadErrorMode`. #90122
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Support `DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory` for NativeAOT applications #90120
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #90119
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • PinnedMarshal after marshalling in unmanaged to managed #90117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Ignore some tests on macOS only due to small stack size #90116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    needs-area-label
  • Update DAC's CMakeLists to create longname pdb #90109
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing Dictionary by string key #90108
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add Caller Allocated Buffer collection marshaller and interface #90107
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Mono] Add a workaround for android apps, in order to leverage the feature of trimming compiled methods #90106
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add Pinned collection parameter type #90103
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Check IsBaselineSimdIsaSupported in LocalAddressVisitor #90099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup callee-allocated-only resources only if the call succeeds (V2) #90098
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][llvm] Use the OP_MEMMOVE opcode instead of calling the managed… #90097
    needs-area-label
  • Simplify Http2Connection shutdown/dispose logic #90094
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Avoid extra `Array.Copy` in `List<T>.Insert(Range)` when the list is full #90089
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove unsafe code and make scheme parsing faster in Uri #90087
    area-System.Net
  • add ReceiveFromAsync and SendToAsync with SocketAddress overload #90086
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Simplify invalid hostname check in DomainNameHelper #90088
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf: Use node 16.x, and update v8 paths to track that #90113
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Fix space, equal for name/value and Indirect Value #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add units to http.client.active_requests & http.client.open_connections #90020
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix build #90118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • GetUnmanagedValues[Source|Destination] by marshal direction, not stub direction #90057
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • SPMI: Throw distinguished exception for recorded exceptions #89978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Improve performance in DI #89964
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • make sure to only enable changes meant for DATAS when it's on #90008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Updating JSON Package Readme #90102
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json
  • [libs][Android] Filter out backwards timezones only with valid tzlookup file #89933
    os-android, area-System.DateTime
  • Fix referencing options source gen project in tests #90104
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable Exception tests. #90095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Put crossgen perf into "Ubuntu.1804.Amd64.Tiger.Perf". #90091
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Convert CMakeSettings.json to CMakePresets.json for coreclr #89513
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade DNNE to build incrementally #89594
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 8.0.0
  • Improve duplicate assembly resolving #89958
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Fix wasm perf setup #90093
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add `JsonNode.ParseAsync` public API #90006
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.MakeReadOnly(bool) overload. #90013
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve test failure messages #89967
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerating framework paths #90035
    area-Host
  • [mono][aot] Use g_strcasecmp () to check whenever aot input assemblie… #90065
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • By value out fixes #89982
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use bidirectional marshallers for elements. #90056
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #90036
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Support breakpoints on AVX-512 instructions #89705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove spurious assertion check causing .NET Core crashes #89986
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Do not generate internal archives #90050
    area-Setup
  • Change generation for NonGC objects for debugger #89927
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid string allocation and improve performance of `JsonProperty.WriteTo` #90074
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [browser] app start benchmark fix, loadBootResource fix #89857
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup work #89976
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2237938 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [JIT] Do not force creation of a new IG if the current IG has no instructions #89876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Blazor] Add basic ICU tests #89771
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: don't dead store OSR exposed locals #89867
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging][wasm] runtime: Fix creating the stack trace for a ManagedError #89905
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "RollForward": major for BrowserDebugHost #89962
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #90053
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [JIT] ARM64 vector right-shift must dead-code eliminate if the constant is zero. #90051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Add CollectionBuilder attribute to some immutable collection interfaces #89459
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Collections, blocked, 8.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement calendar data #90004
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Handle Vector multiplication for long/ulong as intrinsic on pre-AVX512 hardware #87142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move GetMethodTable and IsReference to JIT #88860
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix dupe word typos. #88047
    area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException: use corresponding default message for all overloads #89846
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use popcount intrinsincs in BitOperations #85944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Read `AssetTraitValue` to get culture for resource during webcil transformation #89600
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Generate unique class name for MonoDeadLetter #89956
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Trigger native build when some properties have a different value than the runtime pack #89754
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add extension methods for creating OptionsBuilder with ValidateOnStart support #89973
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • [mono] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsics on amd64 #89997
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add additional filter capabilities to dotnet-pgo tool. #89853
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [tests] Attempt to enable test #89498
    needs-area-label
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
